comment.author: 25229859@N05
comment._content: Bonjour, je suis un administrateur du groupe 30's "ART DECO period", et nous aimerions beaucoup que vous ajoutiez votre photo à notre groupe.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: We're looking for your help! Please help us identify the unnamed in this photograph in the comments below. This photo is featured in a post on the Smithsonian Institution Archives' blog, THE BIGGER PICTURE.

comment.author: 91971452@N08
comment._content: This young girl was unknown to William Silverman.  As his daughter, he went over the photos with me several times over the years. He knew he was taking Clarence Darrow's photo and Mr. Bryan's but none of the others.
